Best game ever, this game made me love FPS game play and team/squad games.

This game definitely is worth it in terms of whether you are a gamer or not. I am, so in about the first 10 hours of game-play I became decent at killing them, depending on who's online. Certain times I will be on and killing people easily and other times I'll get slaughtered. I believe there is also a bug in the aiming system, cause I would inconsistently aim great and then the next round horribly. Although I recommend this game I don't think its the best option. I got bored of it really quickly cause most of the servers are garbage. It was a good game in its time; but now not so much. But it is still a fun game. And it is definitely better the the first.
Ta Muy Bueno el bunny hop

Here you will see why I love Counter-Strike: Source, but in my review you will read about why I gave it a negative review due to some problems.

I love Counter-Strike: Source I wish VALVe ported the singleplayer campaign stories to Counter-Strike: Source from Counter-Strike: Condition Zero Deleted Scenes, I am trying to figure out why VALVe never did.

Otherwise I cannot give Counter-Strike: Source a positive review. Yes I am weird like that for giving Counter-Strike: Source a negative review just for no singleplayer campaign stories ported from Counter-Strike: Condition Zero Deleted Scenes.

Also VALVe please release Counter-Strike, Counter-Strike: Condition Zero, with Counter-Strike: Source included for sale on gog.com. You have said with the Source 2 engine that video game developers developing video games on the Source 2 engine can release the video games that they develop for sale on gog.com please.
I wish I discovered crack instead of this game.

Ламповая атмосфера тех лет немного сохранилась, движок сурс приятнее чем голд сурс на котором КС 1.6, система которая позволяля ставить свои скины никуда не исчезл, но и для тех кто просто хочет вспомнить КС 1.6 не подойдёт, а для тех кто хочет вспомнить атмосферу самое то.
